questions.question: This story arc is named after its geographical formation and features the first appearance of Admiral Aokiji. What is...?
questions.answer: The Long Ring Long Land Arc

questions.question: In this arc, the Straw Hat Pirates face off against the undead on a ghost island under the control of Gecko Moria. What is...?
This arc showcases the history of Sanji and the power struggle within the Vinsmoke Family. What is...?
This ability, showcased by a Straw Hat crew member, grants the power to manipulate and become sand. What is...?
This technique, used by Zoro, involves the use of three swords at once, including one in the mouth. What is...?
This ability, used by a member of the Straw Hat crew, allows for the creation and manipulation of soap and bubbles. What is...?
This character, a former Warlord of the Sea, is known for his shadow-shadow fruit powers and large, looming presence. Who is...?
This character, also known as 'God', was the former ruler of Skypiea and wielder of a powerful staff called the 'Goro Goro no Mi'. Who is...?
This character is a former fleet admiral of the Marines, known for his ice powers and strict sense of justice. Who is...?
